verses.verse: Now on the sealed <S%H2856><s%> document [were the names of: ] Nehemiah <S%H5166><s%> the governor, <S%H8660><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hacaliah, <S%H2446><s%> and Zedekiah, <S%H6667><s%>
Maaziah, <S%H4590><s%> Bilgai, <S%H1084><s%> Shemaiah. <S%H8098><s%> These <S%H428><s%> [were] the priests. <S%H3548><s%>
And the Levites: <S%H3881><s%> Jeshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azaniah, <S%H245><s%> Binnui <S%H1131><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Henadad, <S%H2582><s%> Kadmiel; <S%H6934><s%>
also their brothers <S%H251><s%> Shebaniah, <S%H7645><s%> Hodiah, <S%H1941><s%> Kelita, <S%H7042><s%> Pelaiah, <S%H9452><s%> Hanan, <S%H2605><s%>
The leaders <S%H7218><s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%> Parosh, <S%H6551><s%> Pahath-moab, Elam, <S%H9405><s%> Zattu, <S%H2240><s%> Bani, <S%H1137><s%>

Now the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> the gatekeepers, <S%H7778><s%> the singers, <S%H7891><s%> the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants, <S%H5411><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> those who had separated <S%H914><s%> themselves from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the lands <S%H776><s%> to the law <S%H8451><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> their wives, <S%H802><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters, <S%H1323><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those who had <S%H3045><s%> knowledge <S%H3045><s%> and understanding, <S%H995><s%>

are joining <S%H2388><s%> with their kinsmen, <S%H251><s%> their nobles, <S%H117><s%> and are taking <S%H935><s%> on themselves a curse <S%H423><s%> and an oath <S%H7621><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in God <S%H3068><s%>'s law, <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> God's servant, <S%H5650><s%> and to keep <S%H8104><s%> and to observe <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of God our Lord, <S%H136><s%> and His ordinances <S%H4941><s%> and His statutes; <S%H2706><s%>

and that we will not give <S%H5414><s%> our daughters <S%H1323><s%> to the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> or take <S%H3947><s%> their daughters <S%H1323><s%> for our sons. <S%H1121><s%>

As for the peoples <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> who bring <S%H935><s%> wares <S%H4728><s%> or any <S%H3605><s%> grain <S%H7668><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to sell, <S%H4376><s%> we will not buy <S%H3947><s%> from them on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> or a holy <S%H6944><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> and we will forego <S%H5203><s%> [the crops] the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> and the exaction <S%H4855><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> debt. <S%H3027><s%>

We also placed <S%H5975><s%> ourselves under <S%H5921><s%> obligation <S%H4687><s%> to contribute <S%H5414><s%> yearly <S%H8141><s%> one third <S%H7992><s%> of a shekel <S%H8255><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God: <S%H430><s%>

for the showbread, <S%H3899><s%> <S%H4635><s%> for the continual <S%H8548><s%> grain offering, <S%H4503><s%> for the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> the sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> the new <S%H2320><s%> moon, <S%H2320><s%> for the appointed <S%H4150><s%> times, <S%H4150><s%> for the holy <S%H6944><s%> things <S%H6944><s%> and for the sin <S%H9128><s%> offerings <S%H9128><s%> to make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>

Likewise we cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for the supply <S%H9528><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%> [among] the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> in order that they might bring <S%H935><s%> it to the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> according to our fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> at fixed <S%H2163><s%> times <S%H6256><s%> annually, <S%H8141><s%> to burn <S%H1197><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law; <S%H8451><s%>

and in order that they might bring <S%H935><s%> the first <S%H1061><s%> fruits <S%H1061><s%> of our ground <S%H127><s%> and the first <S%H1061><s%> fruits <S%H1061><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> annually, <S%H8141><s%>

and bring <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%> the first-born of our sons <S%H1121><s%> and of our cattle, <S%H929><s%> and the first-born of our herds <S%H1241><s%> and our flocks <S%H6629><s%> as it is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law, <S%H8451><s%> for the priests <S%H3548><s%> who are ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>

We will also bring <S%H935><s%> the first <S%H7225><s%> of our dough, <S%H6182><s%> our contributions, <S%H8641><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> the new <S%H8492><s%> wine <S%H8492><s%> and the oil <S%H3323><s%> to the priests <S%H3548><s%> at the chambers <S%H3957><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> and the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of our ground <S%H127><s%> to the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> for the Levites <S%H3881><s%> are they who receive <S%H6237><s%> the tithes <S%H6237><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the rural <S%H5656><s%> towns. <S%H5892><s%>

And the priest, <S%H3548><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> shall be with the Levites <S%H3881><s%> when the Levites <S%H3881><s%> receive <S%H6237><s%> tithes, <S%H6237><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall bring <S%H5927><s%> up the tenth <S%H4643><s%> of the tithes <S%H4643><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> to the chambers <S%H3957><s%> of the storehouse. <S%H214><s%>

For the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> the contribution <S%H8641><s%> of the grain, <S%H1715><s%> the new <S%H8492><s%> wine <S%H8492><s%> and the oil, <S%H3323><s%> to the chambers; <S%H3957><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> are the utensils <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who are ministering, <S%H8334><s%> the gatekeepers, <S%H7778><s%> and the singers. <S%H7891><s%> Thus we will not neglect <S%H5800><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>
